title: Malzahar ultimate with Kalista bug!!!
body:
So I love to sit down and have a malzahar game every now and then. During one of my most recent games I was facing a Kalista and EVERY TIME I used my ultimate on her her auto attacks would CONTINUE GOING OFF through the suppression of the ultimate. Now at first it didn't do anything I just thought it was a visual bug but then her auto attacks started doing damage to me through my ultimate?!?! Like what is that!?

{{champion:429}}  bugs through {{champion:90}} Ultimate.

replies.body: It's technically not a bug because kalista's Auto Attacks can't be canceled.
they can't be cancelled manually is what it actually means. CC should cancel all auto attacks in wind-up
Yeah and they fucked up the coding, same thing happens with GA.
